entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
